author: bharath
msg: Desc: During logging, we invoke toString on an array, which will generate junk result. Fixed this by invoking Arrays.toString to convert the array into a readable String that gives the contents of the array.

author: bharath
msg: @Desc During logging, we invoke toString on an array, which will generate junk result. Fixed this by invoking Arrays.toString to convert the array into a readable String that gives the contents of the array.
